mapper.select: select o.orderId as orderId, o.userId as userId, od.productId as productId from orders o, order_detail od where o.orderId = od.orderId and o.userId = #{userId} and od.productId = #{productId}
mapper.insert: insert into orders (userId, total, delivery, status) values (#{userId}, #{total}, #{delivery}, #{status})
mapper.update:
update orders set
delivery = #{delivery, jdbcType=DATA},
status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where orderId = #{orderId}
